snippet: Senator John McCain wants a committee seat where he could weigh in on the nominee for secretary of state. He has already been clear about his opposition to one potential candidate, Susan E. Rice.
abstract: Senator John McCain wants a committee seat where he could weigh in on the nominee for secretary of state. He has already been clear about his opposition to one potential candidate, Susan E. Rice.

headline.main: McCain Wants Committee Job With Influence on Foreign Affairs
